info.title: Stock API Documentation
info.description: A REST API to manage product stocks.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date when the commission should be applied

parameters.name: shopType
parameters.description: Individual or Professional

parameters.name: isRetail
parameters.description: Does it apply for retail or not

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: Web or mobile

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Locale

parameters.name: types[]
parameters.description: List of commission types

parameters.name: logs
parameters.description: Trigger logs

parameters.name: error
parameters.description: Returns a specific error code

200.description: Return success status if the API is up

parameters.name: recreate
parameters.description: Force recreating the media without background.

200.description: Remove the background of an existing image uuid.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by status (PENDING, TRANSFER_PROCESSED, CONFIRMED, CASHOUT_PREPARED, etc.)

get.summary: Get a Currency rates list based on Currency::EUR.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: A date, with YYYY-MM-DD format, to get historical rates

200.description: Returns currency rates based on Currency::EUR

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the pricing

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The initial price, always in cent

parameters.name: special_price
parameters.description: The special price, always in cent

parameters.name: reserved_price
parameters.description: The reserved price, always in cent

parameters.name: pro_discount
parameters.description: The discount percent apply for the pro

parameters.name: sku
parameters.description: The sku of the product

parameters.name: sku
parameters.description: List of sku

parameters.name: sku[]
parameters.description: List of SKU

202.description: Return the product content sent async

200.description: Return an array of one selection for the mobile homepage

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the shop - could be uuid or legacy format

get.summary: Get feedback of a shop by id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The reviews of the shop

200.description: Return the number of reviews of the shop

get.summary: Get feedback of a shop by id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The reviews of the shop

get.summary: Get stats of a shop by id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the shop

parameters.name: sku
parameters.description: Filter by SKU

200.description: Return a list of Stock Movements.

parameters.name: user.id
parameters.description: Existing user UUID, use user.legacyId if the user is not already imported.

parameters.name: user.legacyId
parameters.description: Will create or find an existing user with that legacyId.

parameters.name: order.id
parameters.description: Existing order UUID, use order.legacyId if the order is not already imported.

parameters.name: order.legacyId
parameters.description: Will create or find an existing order with that legacyId.

detail.example: quantity: This value should not be null.

message.example: This value should not be null.
